1.subquestion: How long will an extreme sudoku take compared to regular ones?

subanswer.text: Since an extreme sudoku takes 4 times longer than usual, if a standard one takes 45 minutes, then an extreme sudoku would take 45 * 4 = 180 minutes. The answer is 180.
